question: Create an HTML button with the text 'Click Me'.
description: Create a button element with the specified text.

question: Create an HTML table with 3 columns: Name, Age, and City, and add two rows of sample data.
sampleInput:
Column1-> Name
Column2-> Age
Column3-> City
Row1-> Ravi, 22, Mumbai
Row2-> Priya, 20, Delhi
description: The student must create an HTML table using table, tr, td, and th tags with proper structure.

question: Create an HTML page with title 'My Hobbies' and an unordered list containing three hobbies.
sampleInput:
Title-> My Hobbies
Hobby1-> Reading
Hobby2-> Coding
Hobby3-> Playing Cricket
description: Description of the task to be performed.

question: Create an HTML page with a title 'Contact Info' and a table showing Name and Phone number.
sampleInput:

Name-> Ratan
Phone-> 98XXXXXX10

question: Create an HTML page with title 'My Image' and display an image from source 'mypic.jpg' with width 200px.
sampleInput:
Title-> My Image
Image-> mypic.jpg
Width-> 200px
description: create image tag with given source and width.
